power.title: Bash and Pinion
power.fluff: You slam your weapon through your foe's defenses, creating an opening and stepping in to trap your enemy

element.name: Requirement:
element.text: You must have a hand free

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square to a square adjacent to you.

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You grab the target until the end of your next turn.
Until the grab ends, the target takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Dexterity modifier.

power.title: Bell Ringer
power.fluff: You smash your weapon into your enemy, jarring its vitals

element.name: Prerequisite:
element.text: You must have training in Endurance

element.name: Hit:
element.text: Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus + number of healing surges you have spent damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
You gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

element.name: Weapon:
element.text: If you are wielding a hammer or mace, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

element.name: Miss:
element.text: Half damage, and the target cannot take triggered actions until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Covering Attack
power.fluff: You launch a ferocious attack at your enemy, allowing one of your allies to safely retreat from it

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an ally adjacent to the target can shift 2 squares as a free reaction

element.name: Miss:
element.text: An ally adjacent to the target can shift 1 square as a free reaction.

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Until the end of your next turn, if the target makes an attack against the ally you allowed to shift, your enforce challenge gains the following benefits:
► You can trigger enforce challenge even if the target's attack includes you.
► If the target's attack does not include you, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll and deal half damage even on a miss.

power.title: Distracting Spate
power.fluff: Your flurry of feints and strikes leaves your foe's defenses unstead

element.name: Weapon:
element.text: If you are wielding two melee weapons, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

element.name: Effect:
element.text: The target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
If your attack hit, you can choose for the target to instead grant combat advantage to an ally of your choice.

power.title: Goading Maneuver
power.fluff: After a swift strike, you step to the side and draw more foes into your trap

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you shift 2 squares.

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You mark any enemies adjacent to you until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Hack and Hew
power.fluff: You hack an enemy with one stroke and then slash at another with your next swing

element.name: Secondary Target:
element.text: One creature other than the primary target

power.title: Lunging Strike
power.fluff: You lunge at a foe that thought it was beyond your reach

power.title: Passing Attack
power.fluff: You strike at one foe, allowing your momentum to carry you forward into a second strike at another enemy

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can shift 1 square. Make the secondary attack.

element.name: Secondary Target:
element.text: One creature other than the primary target

power.title: Punishing Charge
power.fluff: As you charge into battle, your weapon opens a path to your chosen foe

element.name: Requirement:
element.text: You must be wielding a two-handed melee weapon.

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Any enemy that attacks you with a melee attack triggered by your charge takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

element.name: Effect:
element.text: Your charge movement cannot be stopped. If a triggered attack places a condition on you that would prevent you from completing this attack, you can make a saving throw to ignore that condition until this attack is completed.

element.name: Special:
element.text: This power can only be used when charging, in place of a melee basic attack.

power.title: Serpent's Coil
power.fluff: Like a striking snake, your weapon flashes and catches the limbs of your foe

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Dexterity modifier.

element.name: Weapon:
element.text: If you are wielding a flail, you grab the target without needing a free hand. The grab ends automatically at the end of your next turn.

power.title: Shield Bash
power.fluff: You knock your adversary off balance with your shield and follow up with a takedown

element.name: Requirement:
element.text: You must be using a shield

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 1d10 + Strength modifier + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square and knock it prone. Additional +1d10 damage on a critical hit.

element.name: Level 11:
element.text: 2d10 + Strength modifier damage. Additional +2d10 damage on a critical hit.

element.name: Special:
element.text:
When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
If you are a dwarf, this power can count as an opportunity attack, used as an opportunity interrupt

power.title: Shield Riposte
power.fluff: Sweeping an attack aside, you strike with your shield while your foe is out of position

element.name: Requirement:
element.text: You must be using a shield

element.name: Trigger:
element.text: An enemy adjacent to you hits or misses you or an ally with a melee attack

element.name: Effect:
element.text: You push the target 1 square and shift 2 squares to a square adjacent to the target.

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 1d10 + Strength modifier damage. Additional +1d10 damage on a critical hit.

element.name: Level 11:
element.text: 2d10 + Strength modifier damage. Additional +2d10 damage on a critical hit.

power.title: Spinning Sweep
power.fluff: You spin beneath your enemy's guard with a slashing strike and then sweep your leg, knocking them to the ground

power.title: Steel Serpent Strike
power.fluff: You lash out with the speed of a striking serpent, hitting your foe in a vulnerable area that hinders their movement

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed and cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

element.name: Miss:
element.text: Target cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Surprising Stab
power.fluff: You slash at your enemy's head and bring in your off-hand weapon with a fast, deadly strike

element.name: Requirement:
element.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons

element.name: Hit:
element.text: Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage, and the target grants you combat advantage until the end of your next turn. Make a secondary attack.

power.title: Takedown Attack
power.fluff: You bash your foe with a vicious attack and then drag the creature down to the ground

element.name: Requirement:
element.text: You must have a hand free

element.name: Hit:
element.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. The target cannot stand up until the end of your next turn or until you are no longer adjacent to it, whichever comes first.

element.name: Special:
element.text: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
